SELECT post.id , post.deleted , post.created_at as createdAt , post.modified_at as modifiedAt
, post.user_id as userId , post.title , post.content , post.countread , post.countlike
, user.username as userUsername , user.name as userName , user.nick as userNick
FROM post, user WHERE post.id = #{id} AND post.user_id = user.id
SELECT post.id , post.title FROM post WHERE post.id is not NULL AND post.deleted = #{deleted} AND post.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
